pullrequest.title: Add BUILD_TESTING CMake option and tests target

content.raw:
here's some discussion:

* https://bitbucket.org/osrf/gazebo/pull-requests/2499/disable-tests-compilation-by-default-new/activity#comment-27852678

an attempted dependency was added and then removed in the following commits:

* https://bitbucket.org/osrf/gazebo/commits/2c75f53ba11d4c121ca5198b08b3950a0d5360e0?at=default
